A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A long time fan\, I grew up devouring expanded universe novels and comics. I feel like this film has realised everything I would want from a new SW film. Unpredictable\, great characters\, good acting\, pathos\, humour\, and lots of genuinely exciting action. I thought The Force Awakens was pretty good but worried it was a bit repetitive of old themes and ideas. This film allayed those worries and has me excited for more!
